author: andschwa
body:
Resolves #1417.

This is not an alias on Linux / OS X.

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: @quoctruong, @raghushantha could you take a look at the [failure](https://travis-ci.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/jobs/45397263#L2293). It appears the test is no longer successful now that clean up is happening correctly.

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body:
@raghushantha this is having a new problem now:

```
Find-Package : Unable to find package source 'https://powershellgettest.pkgs.vi
sualstudio.com/DefaultCollection/_packaging/psgettestfeed/nuget/v2'.
```

Say what?

comments.author: raghushantha
comments.body:
@bmanikm @quoctruong pls investigate the preview feed machine. 

@andschwa please disable the failing tests for now.

title: Fix use of rm alias in tests
